PlugIn.Name: Remote Control
PlugIn.Description: Interface to Alfresco Workdesk, which allows executing distinct functions via URL

PlugIn.Name: Browse
PlugIn.Description: Browse records in your file management

PlugIn.Name: Intake
PlugIn.Description: Browse records in your file management

PlugIn.Name: Search
PlugIn.Description: Search function with search templates for eFiles, documents and data

PlugIn.Name: Contract Partner
PlugIn.Description: Browse records in your file management (register mode)

PlugIn.Name: Account
PlugIn.Description: Browse records in your file management

PlugIn.Name: Settings
PlugIn.Description: Access to user and site settings

Tool.description: Check all required Java Packages or display the Configuration Dump

PlugIn.Name: Paste Contract or SubFolder
PlugIn.Description: Paste objects from clipboard to currently opened folder

PlugIn.Name: Move
PlugIn.Description: Move objects from clipboard to currently opened folder

PlugIn.Name: Add Contract Partner Object Association
PlugIn.Description: Create a new object which is associated with the initial source object

PlugIn.Name: Add Responsible Person Object Association
PlugIn.Description: Create a new object which is associated with the initial source object

PlugIn.Name: Add Master Agreement Object Association
PlugIn.Description: Create a new object which is associated with the initial source object

PlugIn.Name: E-mail Link
PlugIn.Description: Create e-mail with link to object(s)

PlugIn.Name: Upload
PlugIn.Description: Upload new content and keep document checked out

PlugIn.Name: Mass Edit Properties
PlugIn.Description: Edit properties of all selected objects in one step

PlugIn.Name: Open Associated Contract
PlugIn.Description: Opens an eFile, which is directly associated with the initial source object, such as a task object

PlugIn.Name: Pull Workitem using form
PlugIn.Description: Execute the next available work item

PlugIn.Name: Pull Workitem (Standard)
PlugIn.Description: Edit the next available work item with standard step processor

PlugIn.Name: Delete Link
PlugIn.Description: Delete link. Does not delete the object itself.
